Potodoro

Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 3, 2025

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Potodoro ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our mobile application.

Information We Collect

Information stored locally on your device:

  • Focus session data (duration, strain selected, timestamps, tags)
  • App preferences and settings (timer mode, sound preferences, strict mode)
  • Progress data (level, experience points, coins, achievements, streaks)
  • Unlocked strains and customizations

Information processed by Apple:

  • In-app purchase history (processed by Apple, not stored by us)
  • Anonymized crash reports and performance data (if you opt-in via iOS settings)

We do NOT collect:

  • Personal identifying information (name, email, phone)
  • Location data
  • Contacts or photos
  • Usage analytics or tracking data

Data Storage

All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not have servers that store your personal data. Your focus sessions, achievements, and progress exist only on your iPhone.

This means:

  • Your data is as secure as your device
  • If you delete the app, your data is permanently deleted
  • We cannot access, view, or recover your data
  • Your data does not sync between devices

How We Use Information

The data stored on your device is used solely to:

  • Provide the focus timer and plant growing experience
  • Track your progress, streaks, and achievements
  • Display your session history and statistics
  • Enable Live Activities on your Lock Screen and Dynamic Island
  • Show home screen widgets
  • Send local notifications (only if you enable them)

Third-Party Services

Potodoro uses the following Apple services:

  • Apple StoreKit: For processing in-app purchases. Purchase history is managed by Apple according to their privacy policy.
  • Apple Push Notification Service: For local notifications about session completion and trial reminders. These notifications are generated locally on your device.
  • ActivityKit: For Live Activities on Lock Screen and Dynamic Island.
  • WidgetKit: For home screen widgets.

We do not use any third-party analytics, advertising, or tracking services.

Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, rent, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. Since all data is stored locally on your device, we have no access to share.

Data Retention

Your data remains on your device until you choose to delete it. You can delete all app data at any time:

  • Through the app: Settings ‚Üí Reset All Data
  • By deleting the Potodoro app from your device

Children's Privacy

Potodoro is rated 17+ on the App Store due to the nature of its theme. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 17.

Your Rights

Because all data is stored locally on your device, you have complete control:

  • Access: All your data is visible within the app
  • Deletion: Delete via Settings ‚Üí Reset All Data, or by removing the app
  • Portability: Your data stays with your device
  • Opt-out: You can disable notifications and Live Activities in iOS Settings

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the "Last updated" date above. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

hello@potodoro.com
